Package robowars

Class Summary
AbstractEvent Base class for all event classes.
Bullet The Bullet class is instantiated when a robot fires.
BulletHitEvent Represents bullet hitting a robot.
BulletMissedEvent Represents bullet missing a robot (hitting a wall).
Constants The class Constants defines a number of constants.
DeathEvent Represents the death of a robot.
DistanceCompleteEvent Indicates the completion of linear motion set by the method ahead in the class Robot
GunTurnCompleteEvent Indicates the completion of gun motion set by the method turnGun in the class Robot
HitByBulletEvent Represents bullet hitting a robot.
HitRobotEvent Represents robot hitting a robot.
HitWallEvent Represents robot hitting a wall The object of this class is passed to the event handler routine onHitWall The conventions regarding axes and angles are the same as in Robot.
Robot The Robot class serves as the base class for any user defined Robot.
RobotInformation The class RoboInformation encapsulates useful information about a robot.
TurnCompleteEvent Indicates the completion of robot's angular motion set by the method turn in the class Robot
WinEvent Represents robot winning a round.
